contentrichtext.text: {{Other uses|Esen (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox settlement | name = Esen | official_name = | settlement_type = [[Deelgemeente]] | image_skyline = Esen - Esenweg 1.jpg | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = Entering Esen through the Esenweg (N35) | image_map = EsenLocation.svg | mapsize = | map_alt = | map_caption = | image_map1 = | mapsize1 = | map_alt1 = | map_caption1 = | image_dot_map = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Belgium]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Province]] | subdivision_name1 = {{Belgian province WVLA}} | subdivision_type2 = [[Municipality]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Diksmuide]] | latd = 51 | latm = 01 | lats = 46 | latNS = N | longd = 02 | longm = 54 | longs = 08 | longEW = E | coordinates_type = type:city_region:BE | elevation_m = | area_total_km2 = 17.53 | population_note = Source: [[Nationaal Instituut voor de Statistiek|NIS]] | population_as_of = 2007 | population_total = 1854 | population_density_km2 = 106 | demographics1_title1 = | demographics1_info1 = % | demographics1_title2 = | demographics1_info2 = % | postal_code_type = [[Postal code]] | postal_code = 8600 | area_code_type = [[Telephone numbering plan|Area code]] | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} '''Esen''' is a village in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[West Flanders]], and a [[deelgemeente]] of the city of [[Diksmuide]]. It is the home of noted artisanal brewery [[De Dolle Brouwers]]. <br clear="left"/> ==External links== *[http://www.dedollebrouwers.be/ "The Mad Brewers" or De Dolle Brouwers] *[http://www.cityreview.be/west_vlaanderen/esen/ Esen @ City Review] {{WestFlanders-geo-stub}} {{coord|51|02|N|2|54|E|region:BE_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Populated places in Belgium]] [[Category:Diksmuide]]
